name: MokuMiners
description:
This is a little Mokuri fan game I've been working on for GameVket0, It's definitely been a major learning experience working on a larger project like this, and I'm really excited to see what people think of this strange idea.

(Also, game currently supports both english and japanese.)

And if you want to learn more about mokuri, the Vr-World-Mix-Media-thing this game is based on you can check it out here:

https://mokuri.world/en/

Also if you wanna see more from me you can check me out on here:

https://twitter.com/Cole_Dingo
https://www.twitch.tv/coledingo

Japanese translation by: なななな

Music By: Kago

Stock Sound Effects From: Mixit
